description: Styles for the Navbar component of a Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including layout, colors, and hover effects.

classes.name: navbar
classes.description: Container for navigation elements, styled using flexbox and includes various interaction states.

classes.name: navbar__title
classes.description: Title section of the navbar that contains the main heading.

classes.name: navbar__links
classes.description: Container holding the navigation links displayed next to the title.

classes.name: navbar__link
classes.description: Individual link within the navbar, with styles for different states like hover and focus.

classes.name: navbar__reset-btn
classes.description: Button for resetting the game, styled with a gradient and responsive hover effects.
